extends java.lang.Object

    cookiedragon234 07/Dec/2019

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AbstractEvent dispatch(AbstractEvent event)
      Dispatches the given event to all the methods that subscribe to it
      static void register(java.lang.Object subscriber)
      This will index the given class, searching it for methods that subscribe to events.
      static void subscribe(java.lang.Object subscriber)
      Subscribes the given class, meaning that it's methods will be eligible to recieve events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventDispatcher

        public EventDispatcher()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(java.lang.Object subscriber)
        This will index the given class, searching it for methods that subscribe to events. This will **NOT** subscribe the class to receive events. In order to that you need to, well, subscribe it! Just use the subscribe function and pass the same class.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - An initialised class containing methods to be subscribed

      • subscribe

        public static void subscribe(java.lang.Object subscriber)
        Subscribes the given class, meaning that it's methods will be eligible to recieve events. You **MUST** register the class before subscribing it.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - The class to subscribe

      • unsubscribe

        public static void unsubscribe(Subscriber subscriber)
        Unsubscribe the class, therefore making it ineligible to receive events.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - The class to subscribe

      • dispatch

        public static AbstractEvent dispatch(AbstractEvent event)
        Dispatches the given event to all the methods that subscribe to it
        Parameters:
        event - The event to dispatch
        Returns:
        The event that was dispatched
